posts.post_content:
I am looking for the following cards to complete my Non-Hat Portrait Subset. I am looking for raw but will take PSA 1-2 or SGC 10-20 as well. Please send scans to [url]matuxhorn@gmail.com[/url].


Evers, Johnny
Helm, J. Ross
Hickman, Gordon
Hooker, Bock
Lajoie, Nap
Manion, George
Paige, George
Walsh, Ed

Thanks,

Matt
